Ludwig van Beethoven

Two Pieces, WoO 51

latest 1798 · Biamonti 36

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 7'

  • 1. Allegro
  • 2. Adagio

Beethoven wrote these pieces for an orphica, a type of small, portable piano that is carried over the shoulder.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · VII/4 [in preparation]
  • Henle · HN 12 · Klavierstücke · ed. Otto von Irmer
  • Henle · HN 13 · Klavierstücke · ed. Otto von Irmer
  • Könemann · K 198 · Rondi, Kleine Sonaten und Sonatinen · ed. István Máriássy
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50295 · Klavierstücke · ed. Jochen Reutter

1. Allegro

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Adagio

This movement is incomplete; a completion was later made by Ferdinand Ries.
